process.description: TCP4-2211 Verify Watcher and Nested Screen
process.name: TCP4-2211 Verify Watcher and Nested Screen
process.bpmn:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:pm="http://processmaker.com/BPMN/2.0/Schema.xsd" xmlns:tns="http://sourceforge.net/bpmn/definitions/_1530553328908" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="ProcessMaker Modeler" exporterVersion="1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL http://bpmn.sourceforge.net/schemas/BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_1" name="Start Event" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:config="{"web_entry":null}">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_7</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:task id="node_2" name="A" pm:screenRef="336" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_7</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_9</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:task id="node_3" name="B" pm:screenRef="337" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_9</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_11</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_4" name="End Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_11</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_7" sourceRef="node_1" targetRef="node_2"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_9" sourceRef="node_2" targetRef="node_3"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_11" sourceRef="node_3" targetRef="node_4"/>
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmn:collaboration id="collaboration_0">
    <bpmn:participant id="node_5" name="Pool" processRef="ProcessId"/>
  </bpmn:collaboration>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagramId">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlaneId" bpmnElement="collaboration_0">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_1_di" bpmnElement="node_1">
        <dc:Bounds x="170" y="380" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_2_di" bpmnElement="node_2">
        <dc:Bounds x="270" y="360" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_3_di" bpmnElement="node_3">
        <dc:Bounds x="470" y="360" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_4_di" bpmnElement="node_4">
        <dc:Bounds x="680" y="380" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_5_di" bpmnElement="node_5">
        <dc:Bounds x="110" y="260" width="676" height="300"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_7_di" bpmnElement="node_7">
        <di:waypoint x="188" y="398"/>
        <di:waypoint x="328" y="398"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_9_di" bpmnElement="node_9">
        <di:waypoint x="328" y="398"/>
        <di:waypoint x="528" y="398"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_11_di" bpmnElement="node_11">
        <di:waypoint x="528" y="398"/>
        <di:waypoint x="698" y="398"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</bpmn:definitions>

script.title: Verification Watcher and Nested Screen A
script.description: Verification Watcher and Nested Screen A
script.code:
<?php 
    // input array
    $state = array("AS"=>"ASSAM", "OR"=>"ORRISA", "KR"=>"KERELA");
      
    extract($state);
      
    // after using extract() function
$text = "$AS is $AS $KR is $KR $OR is $OR";
$array_implode = ["Israel", "Japan", "Germany"];
$array_text_implode = implode(" ", $array_implode);
return ['text'=> $text, 'text_imploded'=> $array_text_implode];     
?>

scripts.code:
<?php 
    // input array
    $state = array("AS"=>"ASSAM", "OR"=>"ORRISA", "KR"=>"KERELA");
      
    extract($state);
      
    // after using extract() function
$text = "$AS is $AS $KR is $KR $OR is $OR";
$array_implode = ["Israel", "Japan", "Germany"];
$array_text_implode = implode(" ", $array_implode);
return ['text'=> $text, 'text_imploded'=> $array_text_implode];     
?>
